name: Spider Cooking
desc: Create an area of miasma around, dealing slow damage to enemies inside.

name: Elite Lava Bucket
desc: Drop lava on the ground, burning targets slowly.

levels.desc: Increase damage by 30% and increase duration of lava by 1 second.
Throw 4 lava buckets and increase lava size by 20%.

name: Holo Bomb
desc: A bomb that explodes, dealing damage to all nearby targets.

levels.desc: Reduce the time between attacks by 20%.

name: Psycho Axe
desc: Throw an axe that spirals outward from the player.

levels.desc: Increase size of axe by 20%. Increase damage by 20%.
Increase damage by 33%, and size by 20%.
Remove hit limit, and lasts 1 second longer.

name: BL Book
desc: Repel targets with orbitting BL Books.

levels.desc: Increase damage by 30% and increase duration by 1 second.

name: Cutting Board
desc: Create a defensive wall that damages targets behind you. Effectiveness is increased on certain characters.
requirement: Survive for 10 minutes using Ina in one run.

levels.desc: Increase size of the wall by 30%
Reduce the time between attacks by 0.5 seconds.

name: Fan Beam
desc: Shoot a powerful laser beam from the microphone. Horizontal Only.

name: Plug Type Asacoco
desc: Fire a fast piercing tail targeted at a random target.

name: Glowstick
desc: Throw a glowstick to a nearby target and then spins back to player.

levels.desc: Increase hit limit by 10 and throw one additional glowstick.

name: Idol Song
desc: Magical music notes that float vertically in both directions.
requirement: Survive for 10 minutes using Irys in one run.

levels.desc: Reduce the time between attacks by 20%.

name: BL Fujoshi
desc: A collaboration of BL Book and Psycho Axe. Endless BL, how shameless!

name: MiComet
desc: A collaboration of Elite Lava Bucket and Psycho Axe. Real business partners.

name: Elite Cooking
desc: A collaboration of Elite Lava Bucket and Spider Cooking. May have severe unknown side effects if consumed.

name: Idol Concert
desc: A collaboration of Idol Song and Glowstick. Throw glowstick in all directions that esxplode into song!

name: Light Beam
desc: A collaboration of Glowstick and Fan Beam. Throw glowsticks that explode into targeted beams!

name: Dragon Fire
desc: A collaboration of Fan Beam and Plug In Type Asacoco. The power of a once LEGENDARY Dragon. The OG.

name: Breathe-In Type Asacoco
desc: A collaboration of PLug Type Asacoco and Holo Bomb. Limited time only for 5000 yen!!!

name: Flattening Board
desc: A collaboration of Cutting Board and Holo Bomb. Feel the wrath of cutting boards...!?.

name: Sake
desc: If not taking any damage for 10 seconds or longer, increase crit by 10%. Buff ends upon receiving damage.

levels.desc: If not taking any damage for 10 seconds or longer, increase crit by 15%. Buff ends upon receiving damage.
If not taking any damage for 10 seconds or longer, increase crit by 20%. Buff ends upon receiving damage.

name: Body Pillow
desc: Gain a shield that absorbs up to 15 damage. Every 15 seconds, this shield refreshes.

levels.desc: Gain a shield that absorbs up to 20 damage. Every 15 seconds, this shield refreshes.
Gain a shield that absorbs up to 25 damage. Every 15 seconds, this shield refreshes.
Gain a shield that absorbs up to 30 damage. Every 15 seconds, this shield refreshes.
Gain a shield that absorbs up to 35 damage. Every 15 seconds, this shield refreshes.

name: Injection Type Asacoco
desc: Lose 5% HP every second (until 1 HP remains), but gain 30% damage.
requirement: Beate Stage Mode with an Asacoco product (only Tail Plug and Breathe-In Type Asacoco works, not Dragon Fire)

levels.desc: Lose 5% HP every second (until 1 HP remains), but gain 40% damage.
Lose 5% HP every second (until 1 HP remains), but gain 50% damage.

name: Credit Card
desc: Cost of enhancing is reduced by 20% and anvils appear 20% more often.

levels.desc: Cost of enhancing is reduced by 25% and anvils appear 20% more often.
Cost of enhancing is reduced by 30% and anvils appear 20% more often.
Cost of enhancing is reduced by 35% and anvils appear 20% more often.
Cost of enhancing is reduced by 40% and anvils appear 20% more often.

name: Knightly Milk
desc: Increases attack range of area-type weapons by 10%. Also Increase pick-up radius by 30%.

levels.desc: Increases attack range of area-type weapons by 15%. Also Increase pick-up radius by 40%.
Increases attack range of area-type weapons by 20%. Also Increase pick-up radius by 50%.

name: Face Mask
desc: Increase damage by 30%. Take 30% more damage.

levels.desc: Increase damage by 35%. Take 30% more damage.
Increase damage by 40%. Take 30% more damage.

name: Plushie
desc: After taking any damage, gain invulnerability for 0.3 seconds. However, you also lose 20% ATK and SPD for 5 seconds.
requirement: Survive for 10 minutes using Bae in one run.

levels.desc: After taking any damage, gain invulnerability for 0.4 seconds. However, you also lose 20% ATK and SPD for 5 seconds.
After taking any damage, gain invulnerability for 0.5 seconds. However, you also lose 20% ATK and SPD for 5 seconds.

name: Succubus' Horn
desc: When a target is defeated, there is a 20% chance to heal for 5% of Max HP

levels.desc: When a target is defeated, there is a 20% chance to heal for 7.5% of Max HP
When a target is defeated, there is a 20% chance to heal for 10% of Max HP

name: Full Meal
desc: All healing is doubled.

name: Piki Piki Piman
desc: Upon being hit, increase crit by 10% for 10 seconds.

levels.desc: Upon being hit, increase crit by 15% for 10 seconds.
Upon being hit, increase crit by 20% for 10 seconds.

name: Headphones
desc: 15% chance to negate 1 hit, and create a shockwave that knocks back all enemies.

levels.desc: 20% chance to negate 1 hit, and create a shockwave that knocks back all enemies.
25% chance to negate 1 hit, and create a shockwave that knocks back all enemies.
30% chance to negate 1 hit, and create a shockwave that knocks back all enemies.
35% chance to negate 1 hit, and create a shockwave that knocks back all enemies.

name: Gorilla's Paw
desc: Increase normal attack damage by 30%, but lose 50% critical chance.

levels.desc: Increase normal attack damage by 35%, but lose 50% critical chance.
Increase normal attack damage by 40%, but lose 50% critical chance.

name: Uber Sheep
desc: Every 20 seconds, food will drop closeby. Also increase food drop chance from defeated targets by 10%.

levels.desc: Every 19 seconds, food will drop closeby. Also increase food drop chance from defeated targets by 12%.
Every 18 seconds, food will drop closeby. Also increase food drop chance from defeated targets by 15%.
Every 17 seconds, food will drop closeby. Also increase food drop chance from defeated targets by 18%.
Every 15 seconds, food will drop closeby. Also increase food drop chance from defeated targets by 20%.

name: Idol Costume
desc: Reduce Special cooldown by 20%.

name: Energy Drink
desc: Increase SPD by 20%, but reduce Max HP by 25% as well.
requirement: Survive for 10 minutes using Calli in one run.

levels.desc: Increase SPD by 25%, but reduce Max HP by 25% as well.
Increase SPD by 30%, but reduce Max HP by 25% as well.
Increase SPD by 35%, but reduce Max HP by 25% as well.
Increase SPD by 40%, but reduce Max HP by 25% as well.

name: Study Glasses
desc: Increase EXP gain by 10%.

name: Super Chatto Time!
desc: Targets drop 20% more Holo Coins.
requirement: Obtain 5000 coins total. (you only need to have 5000 total at the end of a run, not from a single run)
